titles.title: A bill to modify and extend the temporary reduction of duty on mixtures of imidacloprid with application adjuvants.
A bill to modify and extend the temporary reduction of duty on mixtures of imidacloprid with application adjuvants.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily reduce the duty on mixtures of imidacloprid with application adjuvants.
